T02D2450:85b-1: dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du mkha' 'gro
T02D2450:85b-2: ma bde ba'i ro zan mas dbyings kyi gtso mo
T02D2450:85b-3: rnams la tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor nas /
T02D2450:85b-4: rjes la rgun chang phra men gyi snod bkang ba drangs te /
T02D2450:85b-5: rtogs pa brjod pa'i mgur re zhus pas /
T02D2450:85b-6: dang po la mkha' 'gro ma nyi zla gser gyi
T02D2450:85b-7: thor cog can gyis rtogs pa brjod de mgur bzhengs
T02D2450:85b-8: pa / kye ho ma bcos rnal ma'i shes pa la /
T02D2450:86a-2: dkar dmar yul gyi snang ba 'di //
T02D2450:86a-3: brda ru go na bla ma yin //
T02D2450:86a-6: // / mkha' 'gro ma ral ba'i thor cog can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86a-7: kye ho gnyis su med na 'ching grol med //
T02D2450:86a-8: ngos gzung med na sgrib pa med //
T02D2450:86a-9: rang bzhin med na chags sdang med //
T02D2450:86a-10: dran du med na yengs su med //
T02D2450:86a-13: // / mkha' 'gro ma rlung gi gshog pa can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86a-14: kye ho chos rnams gzhi med rmi lam 'dra //
T02D2450:86a-15: snang bar rkyen skyes gzugs brnyan 'dra //
T02D2450:86a-16: rang byung rang zhe lbu ba 'dra //
T02D2450:86a-17: rtsa bral chen po nam mkha' 'dra //
T02D2450:86a-20: // / mkha' 'gro ma nyi zla'i thod phreng can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86a-21: kye ho de nyid nyams su myong ba'i skyes bu gang //
T02D2450:86a-22: bde chen nam mkha'i khams su mi shong ngo //
T02D2450:86a-23: 'di la mtshon du 'dug gam khyod kyis smros //
T02D2450:86a-24: nga yis ci yang mthong pa med par mthong //
T02D2450:86a-27: // / mkha' 'gro ma lva ba'i gos can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86a-28: kye ho padma'i ge sar snying gi dbus su sad //
T02D2450:86a-29: gsal ba'i me tog 'dam gyi dri ma bral //
T02D2450:86a-30: dri dang kha dog ldan pa gang gis rkyen //
T02D2450:86a-31: 'di la dgag dang bsgrub pa yod dam ci //
T02D2450:86a-34: // / mkha' 'gro ma me kha las rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86a-35: kye ho nam mkha' las byung cho 'phrul ni //
T02D2450:86a-36: nam mkha' nyid kyis byas pa'i phyir //
T02D2450:86a-37: nam mkha'i dang du rang byung ste //
T02D2450:86a-38: 'di la skyon du ma 'dzin cig / gsung ngo /
T02D2450:86a-40: // / mkha' 'gro ma ro langs bde mas rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86a-41: kye ho bla ma'i drin gyis bde chen mchog rnyed nas //
T02D2450:86a-42: thabs gzhan brtan pa rmongs pa shes par bya //
T02D2450:86a-43: 'di las glud du gyur pa'i bde lam zhig / gzhan nas rnyed pa sus kyang nus pa med //
T02D2450:86a-46: // / mkha' 'gro ma ye shes rdo rjes rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86a-47: kye ho sna tshogs snang ba'i cho 'phrul 'di //
T02D2450:86a-48: dran pa'i gzugs brnyan yin shes shing //
T02D2450:86a-49: dran pa rang ngos stong shes na //
T02D2450:86a-50: dbyings kyi bde ba btsal mi dgos //
T02D2450:86a-51: mkha' 'gro ma srid pa'i rgyal mos rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86a-52: kye ho rang rig rgyal po 'di mthong na //
T02D2450:86a-53: thams cad thams cad thar pa'i lam //
T02D2450:86a-54: rang rig nyid ni ma rtogs na //
T02D2450:86a-55: grol ba nam yang yod ma yin //
T02D2450:86b-0: // / @86b mkha' 'gro ma padma zhabs kyis rtogs pa'i brda brjod pa /
T02D2450:86b-1: kye ho yod med tha dad bral ba la //
T02D2450:86b-2: gang gis brtag dpyad bya bar nus //
T02D2450:86b-3: dran med blo dang bral ba la //
T02D2450:86b-4: gang gis bsam zhing bsgom par nus //
T02D2450:86b-7: // / mkha' 'gro ma rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86b-8: kye ho stong nyid rig pa'i rtsal dang ldan //
T02D2450:86b-9: skye med skye ba'i cho 'phrul ston //
T02D2450:86b-10: dgag sgrub med de rang sar grol //
T02D2450:86b-11: 'di la bya rgyu ngas ma rnyed //
T02D2450:86b-14: // / mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i gdong pa can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86b-15: kye ho yod do byas na ngos gzung med //
T02D2450:86b-16: med do byas na sna tshogs 'char //
T02D2450:86b-17: yod med mkha' las 'das pa la //
T02D2450:86b-18: 'di zhes nga yis mtshon mi nus //
T02D2450:86b-21: // / mkha' 'gro ma gzi brjid kyi rgyal mos rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86b-22: dran du med na ma yengs shig / yengs pas 'khor ba rmi lam 'dra //
T02D2450:86b-23: rtogs na skyes bu gnyid sad 'dra //
T02D2450:86b-24: ngas ni 'khor ba ma mthong ngo //
T02D2450:86b-27: // / mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi bzang mos rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86b-28: kye ho snang srid 'di ni phyag rgya che //
T02D2450:86b-31: bde chen thang la rgyug tu gsol //
T02D2450:86b-34: // / mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi 'od zer gyis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86b-35: kye ho gnyug mngon gyi gter mdzod na //
T02D2450:86b-36: dgos 'dod sems nyid nor bu yod //
T02D2450:86b-37: lde mig bla ma dam pas 'dzin //
T02D2450:86b-38: rjes su 'jug pa spro lags sam //
T02D2450:86b-41: // / mkha' 'gro ma bzang mos rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86b-42: ltos shig rang gi sems la ltos //
T02D2450:86b-43: bltas pas ma rnyed rtsa ba stor //
T02D2450:86b-44: yal ga ji ltar dgyes dgyes mdzod //
T02D2450:86b-45: da ni rtog pa rang grol yin //
T02D2450:86b-48: // / mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje bde mas rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86b-50: bde ba rang las gzhan med de //
T02D2450:86b-51: bskyar de rang gi don de ltos //
T02D2450:86b-52: yid ni lam las thar bar 'gyur //
T02D2450:86b-55: // / bdag nyid chen po nyi ma'i dbang phyug gis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:86b-56: nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid kyis //
T02D2450:86b-57: snang srid gsal zhing bsregs pa ltar //
T02D2450:86b-58: gnyis med ye shes chen po yis //
T02D2450:87a-4: // / mkha' 'gro ma lha dpal gyi ye shes kyis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87a-5: kye ho nga ni mi skye mi 'jig ste //
T02D2450:87a-6: 'gyur med ye shes rdo rje yin //
T02D2450:87a-7: nga las byung ba'i chos rnams kun //
T02D2450:87a-8: nga yi ngo bor mnyam du grol //
T02D2450:87a-11: // / mkha' 'gro ma stag gi gdong pa can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87a-12: kye ho mi skye mi 'gag bsam las 'das //
T02D2450:87a-13: 'di zhes mtshon pa'i tshig dang bral //
T02D2450:87a-14: ye grol chen po mchog gi lam //
T02D2450:87a-15: bsam du med do rang sar zhog / gsung ngo /
T02D2450:87a-17: // / mkha' 'gro ma zhi ba bzang mos rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87a-18: kye ho sems kyi de nyid smra ru med //
T02D2450:87a-19: gshis kyi de nyid bsam du med //
T02D2450:87a-20: chos kyi de nyid ngos gzung med //
T02D2450:87a-21: lam gyi de nyid bsgom du med //
T02D2450:87a-24: // / mkha' 'gro ma gha gha dpal gyis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87a-25: kye ho bu khyod ci sems de la ltos //
T02D2450:87a-26: spros dang bral ba mthong du med //
T02D2450:87a-27: bsam du med pa su zhig bsgom //
T02D2450:87a-28: 'di la ma rtsol gzhi la zhog / gsung ngo /
T02D2450:87a-30: // / mkha' 'gro ma ye shes dbang phyug gis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87a-31: gang gis de nyid ma mthong na //
T02D2450:87a-32: lus ngag dge ba'i las spyang kyang //
T02D2450:87a-33: bde chen mchog dang mi phrad de //
T02D2450:87a-34: gnas skabs tsam gyis bde bar zad //
T02D2450:87a-37: // / mkha' 'gro ma bde ba'i rdo rjes rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87a-38: kye ho gang gis mthong dang thos pa dang //
T02D2450:87a-39: dran dang tshor ba'i bye brag kun //
T02D2450:87a-40: yid kyi ye shes dangs pa la //
T02D2450:87a-41: gzugs brnyan zam du shar ba las //
T02D2450:87a-42: gzhi lam grub ngo bos stong //
T02D2450:87a-45: // / mkha' 'gro ma lha nyi ma'i rta can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87a-46: gang gis ma mthong de mthong na //
T02D2450:87a-47: yid ni rang grol chos kyi sku //
T02D2450:87a-48: rlung gi rta pho shul du lus //
T02D2450:87a-49: sems kyi mi pho mkha' la 'gro //
T02D2450:87a-52: // / mkha' 'gro ma padma'i myu gus rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87a-53: 'gro ba yid kyi phreng bas bcings //
T02D2450:87a-54: yid bsad phreng thag bcad pa yis //
T02D2450:87a-55: dug sbrul mtshon gyis gtses pa bzhin //
T02D2450:87a-56: 'di yis phan gnod byas pa med //
T02D2450:87a-59: // / mkha' 'gro ma dbyings kyi rgyal mos rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87a-60: kye ho nam mkha' yongs su dangs na tshon gyis bsgyur du med //
T02D2450:87b-0: rtogs dang ldan pa'i @87b skyes bu las kyis bcing du med //
T02D2450:87b-1: gdengs med gyad kyi spyod pa byed pa 'di //
T02D2450:87b-2: seng ge'i pags pa wa yis gon pa 'dra //
T02D2450:87b-5: // / mkha' 'gro ma zla ba'i gdong can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87b-6: kye ho ye shes chen po mchog gi lam //
T02D2450:87b-7: ma bgrod de bzhin nyid kyi sa //
T02D2450:87b-8: ma bsgrubs lhun gyis grub pa'i don //
T02D2450:87b-9: ae ma rnal 'byor skal bar bzang //
T02D2450:87b-12: // / mkha' 'gro ma 'bar ma glog gi phreng ba can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87b-13: bltas kyis ma mthong nga yi mig / bsam gyis ma dran nga yi sems //
T02D2450:87b-14: smras kyis ma brjod nga yi lce //
T02D2450:87b-15: bgrod kyang ma phyin nga yi lam //
T02D2450:87b-18: // / mkha' 'gro ma shel gyi thor tshugs can gyis rtogs ba brjod pa /
T02D2450:87b-19: mi bsgom rnal ma'i shes pa la //
T02D2450:87b-20: dran pas bzung dang ma bzung med //
T02D2450:87b-21: mi spyod sgo gsum lhug pa la //
T02D2450:87b-22: ched du dgag dang sgrub pa med //
T02D2450:87b-25: // / mkha' 'gro ma nyi ma'i rgyal mos rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87b-26: kye ho rang byung bde chen ye shes 'di //
T02D2450:87b-27: ma rtogs smra bar mi nus te //
T02D2450:87b-28: rtogs nas brjod du ga la yod //
T02D2450:87b-29: myong ba smra med lkugs pa'i kha //
T02D2450:87b-32: // / mkha' 'gro ma seng ge'i mdangs can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87b-33: kho la ma lta nga la ltos //
T02D2450:87b-34: nga ni ye shes chen po yin //
T02D2450:87b-35: kho ni nga yi sprul pa yin //
T02D2450:87b-36: gnyis med ye shes blo las 'das //
T02D2450:87b-39: // / mkha' 'gro ma khrag gi gdong pa can gyis rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87b-40: kye ho dran dang ma dran so mtshams su //
T02D2450:87b-41: yid kyi shes pa bsam las 'das //
T02D2450:87b-42: bla ma'i zhal las shes par gyis //
T02D2450:87b-43: gzhan gyis rtogs par 'gyur ma yin //
T02D2450:87b-46: // / mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi sgron mes rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87b-47: kye ho gang phyir yid kyi ye shes 'di //
T02D2450:87b-48: khyod kyis bltas pas ji ltar mthong //
T02D2450:87b-49: brtags pas rtogs par mi 'gyur te //
T02D2450:87b-50: mi btsal de bzhin nyid du bzhag / gsung ngo /
T02D2450:87b-52: // / mkha' 'gro ma snang gsal gyi rgyal mos rtogs pa brjod pa /
T02D2450:87b-54: bram ze skud pa 'khal ba bzhin //
T02D2450:87b-55: yid kyis 'jur bu glod par bya //
T02D2450:87b-56: las las grol na 'ching ba med //
T02D2450:88a-0: // / @88a * // ye shes kyi mkha' 'gro ma sum cu rtsa lnga'i
T02D2450:88a-1: rtogs pa brjod pa mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang mdzod na
T02D2450:88a-2: gnas pa las / dbyings kyi gtso mo rnams kyis
T02D2450:88a-3: bka' bgros nas rje dam pa rgya gar la gnang
